article.title: L-3 to Provide Radio Terminal Sets
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: L-3 Communications Systems-West is being awarded a $60 million contract for the manufacture, test and delivery of 9 SRQ-4(Ku) radio terminal sets (RTSs) for ship small-surface combatants and 45 ARQ-58 RTSs for the MH-60R aircraft, including technical data.
